mapper.select: SELECT b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_content AS boardContent, b.board_created_at AS boardCreateAt, b.board_file_name AS boardFileName, b.board_file AS boardFile, b.board_file_size AS boardFileSize, b.employee_id AS employeeId FROM board b WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.board_title AS boardTitle, e.employee_name AS employeeName, b.board_created_at AS boardCreateAt FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY b.board_created_at DESC
